result.description: Form element that provides a dropdown panel of options for users to select from
result.label: Select

result.description: Ribbons provide contextual information about the record displayed in the form, allowing users to quickly scan relevant information about the record
result.label: Ribbon

result.description: Seismic Component for Tab Filters
result.label: Tab filter

result.description: Renders Lottie animation with optional progress bar and label
result.label: Loader Custom

result.description: Component that displays the improvement initiatives for a Process Mining Project
result.label: Process Mining - Improvement Initiatives

result.description: Component that allows users to visually create and edit encoded queries and/or query objects
result.label: Condition Builder

result.description: A component to map a source complex object to a target complex object
result.label: IntegrationHub Data Mapping

result.description: Bundle contains the components necessary to display a playbook in focused horizontal layout.
result.label: Playbook Focused Horizontal

result.description: Color picker to enable selection of a desired color
result.label: Color picker

result.description: Components are responsible for displaying the layout of fields within a form.
result.label: Form

result.description: A group of link set components that are visually organized into a single group. The link set group is useful for large collections of links, for example in a Portal footer, where it can be useful to control the overflow and layout together as one object.
result.label: Link set group

result.description: View conversion rates in aggregate user behavior to uncover the reasons behind success or failure of a user flow. This visualization only works with User Experience Analytics data
result.label: UX Analytics Funnel

result.description: Donut visualization
result.label: Donut

result.description: The migration center for migrating from classic Analytics to the Next Experience Analytics
result.label: Next Experience Migration Center

result.description: Confirm Modal
result.label: Confirm

result.description: Button with a background color
result.label: Button

result.description: Displays the avatars of users viewing the same record
result.label: Form record presence

result.description: Method to scan and read label-values in a list form with a solution for displaying multiple label-values for cases in which horizontal space is limited
result.label: Label value tabbed

result.description: This component enables users to navigate between dashboards they own or that are shared with them. Users can see all these dashboards or only those that are bookmarked or certified, or that they created.
result.label: Dashboard overview

result.description: A container to group filters
result.label: Filter Group (now-filter-group)

result.description: Visualization Designer
result.label: Visualization Designer

result.description: Seismic component for sharing dialog, this component is generic
result.label: PAR Share Dialog

result.description: Displays the main details (fields) of the given record for the given table. Form layout is based on the configured workspace and view/view rules. This is a connected component that uses a simplified configuration (table and sys id only). It is easier to set up than the Form component, but less flexible in how it pulls data. This component is typically embedded in other components such as modals.
result.label: Display only form

result.description: An animated skeleton to indicate a loading state
result.label: Skeleton Loader

result.description: Displays selected playbook stage activities in a stacked or focused view.
result.label: Playbook Activity Viewer

result.description: Component that creates the rule-based findings
result.sys_name: Process Mining - Create Rule Based Finding Definition
result.label: Process Mining - Create Rule Based Finding Definition

result.description: A component to create mappings with pills or text to an entity field
result.label: IntegrationHub Entity Field Editor

result.description: SNC internal filter connected wrapper
result.label: Filter connected wrapper

result.description: Displays records from a table in configurable columns with sorting and filtering capabilities. Consider using the Record List bundle in place of this component. All new features will be added to that bundle, and this component will be retired.
result.label: List

result.description: Code editor component for the JavaScript, JSON, CSS, XML, and HTML languages
result.label: Now Code Editor

result.description: Tags allow users to assign categories to records.
result.label: Record tags

result.description: Collapsible tree of selectable data
result.label: Content tree

result.description: Modal for creating a preset
result.label: Preset Create Modal

result.description: An interactive representation of data from a database table. Consider using the Record List bundle in place of this component. All new features will be added to that bundle, and this component will be retired.
result.label: List - Related

result.description: Displays playbook activity.
result.label: Playbook Activity Picker

result.description: Reusable UI component Now Assist context menu
result.label: WWNA

// eslint-disable-next-line no-unused-vars

result.description: A card subcomponent for visually separating sections within a card
result.label: Card Base Divider

result.description: Lets users setup multi-factor authentication (MFA)
result.label: MFA setup

result.description: Custom Modal for UIB
result.label: Custom

result.description: An interactive control for selecting a single input from a group of mutually exclusive choices
result.label: Radio buttons

result.description: Component that enables users to create new journal entries for the activity stream
result.label: Activity Stream Compose

result.description: A mini calendar where you can select a date
result.label: Mini Calendar

result.description: Step timeseries visualization
result.label: Step

result.description: Allows users to navigate between lists using a content tree. Consider using the new sn-now-list-menu with the Record List Bundle in place of this component. All new features will be added to that component, and this component will be retired.
result.label: List menu

result.description: A text link is a stylized element of text that is linked to another resource
result.label: Text link

result.description: An interactive control for indicating an affirmative, negative, or indeterminate choice
result.label: Checkbox

result.description: Reusable kanban board component used with the drag-and-drop feature.
result.label: Kanban Board

result.description: Search the CMDB to find CIs and their relationships
result.label: CMDB NLQ Search Connected

result.description: An SVG asset that can be added to clarify container text or convey additional information to the user
result.label: Illustration

result.description: Component that displays all the notes for a Process Mining Project
result.label: Process Mining - Notes

result.description: Label-value set showing the labels vertically above values or horizontally side-by-side
result.label: Label value stacked

result.description: Shows an article to users to give them useful information.
result.label: Knowledge content

result.description: Collab Create Chat Modal
result.label: Collab Create Chat Modal

result.description: A card subcomponent that enables the user to take action via one or more buttons
result.label: Card Base Actions

result.description: Service maps show relationships between CIs and active alerts for CIs. By viewing this information, a user can better understand the source of alerts and take remediation steps. The service map is available for all application services.
result.label: Service Map

result.description: Calendar that enables a requestor or fulfiller to select an appointment time from a set of available appointment slots
result.label: Appointment calendar

result.description: Iconic buttons use an icon instead of text to convey an action
result.label: Button iconic

result.description: Layers of content that users can switch between using tabs.
result.label: Tabs

result.description: Displays search results by search source. Only for use in Workspace
result.label: Workspace global search tab

result.description: Semi donut visualization
result.label: Semi donut
